article.title: Information Analysis and Retrieval
article.author: Kent, A.
article.text: Therefore the purpose of this book remains the same as that of Textbook on Mechanized Information Retrieval - to teach basics to those who have had no previous exposure either to the field or to computers, or both. Therefore, the action is slowed to the point where the logical principles of information retrieval systems are laid bare. Other books have been published that emphasize computer programming - this one does not.
